__e: So, uh, once again, my dear, thank you.
But, my dear, you're doing all you can here, and your husband is there.
I have much to do, and you, my darling, even more.
My darling, I won't leave you. Not one second.
Yes, I'm fine thanks, don't worry.
And you, dear, are not one of them.
Anyway, darling, you don't have to do anything. You don't have to do anything!
- I don't know, honey. I just don't know.
My good woman, I have nothing to do with that.
I have no idea, dear lady, what you're talking about, but that is beside the point.
Yes, my darling, and all that.
You've got your sweetie here, why shouldn't I have mine?
Oh, I know, darling, and that's fine.
And as for your dear mother and father, well...
Such as the fact that your cherished mother...
Dear Mother, I'm not against you, and I know that you are not against us.
As well she should, my dear, as well she should.
And that, my dear, is what makes this so very hard.
"It's the shame, darlin', it's the shame."
